answers.answer: Yes it would be best for u to go see ur doctor cuz it sounds like a problem u wanna get fixed right away.
But do you know what's wrong or what it could be?
I would go to l&b sounds like pre eclampsia ...don't wanna worry u but better safe than sorry
I agree with the above, those are some of the symptoms my mw told me to contract her straight away about. So nip along to l&d. Better safe than sorry!

Do me a favor & please go to l&d. It def sounds like prealamapysia. Since your at 31 weeks but been felling it than its considered severe. I had stupid preaclampysia at 29 weeks 5 days, doctors didnt catch it & I had no symptoms, it resulted in placenta detaching & my daughter passing away. Its the worst thing any woman could possibly go thru, my baby was only 2pounds. Just pleaae go get checked and dnt wait any longrr!! I dnt wish this experince any on expexting mother!
Sabrinaaa27 So so sorry to hear that.Tierra Rose.....all the best babe let us know how you go. God bless.

question: Okay so I have been having some weird things going on this week and I'm 31w4d. I have had diareah and extream neasua and dizziness for a few days and yesterday my lips, cheeks, and part of my tongue were tingly swollen and slightly numb, and for a few days in dim light or in the dark my right eye goes blurry and after awhile I can't see out of it at all until I turn on a light then it goes back to normal, I also have other symptoms but they seem like normal pregnancy stuff so I won't list them all but can any one tell me what's wrong and if I should be worried or call a doctor?!?
title: Should I be worried?!?
